rukus.text: 19|83|tae anak min bankheunh teryy  yeung ban banhchoun puok shai t ntow  champoh puok brachheang  daembi bangvok puokke( aoy br pru td ampeuaeakrak ning  sthet knong pheap v nge  v ng) noh

19|84|dau che  neah  chaur anak( mou ham meat) kom branhab( som aoy yeung thveu  tearounakamm) champoh puokke aoy saoh .  tampit yeung kreante kit kou  pelvelea aoy ban chbasaleasa samreab puokke bonnaoh .
19|85|now thngai del yeung nung bramoulophdom banda anak del kaotakhlach tow  kan mcheasa mha sabborsa chea phnhiev ke tde y sa .
19|86|haey yeung nung kieng puok del br pru td ampeuaeakrak towkean  nork cheu han nam  daoy puokke se  r k khlean yeang khlang .
19|87|puokke( puok kmean chomnue) kmean setthi ttuol kar a nd reak m laey  leuklengte anak del ban ttuol yk karosanyea pi mcheasa  mha sabborsa bonnaoh .
19|88|haey puokke ban niyeay tha  mcheasa mha sabborsa mean  botr .
19|89|chea karpit nasa  puok anak ban neamk nouv brakear muoy akrak  bamphot .
19|90|daoy peakyasaamdei nih  thveu aoy mekh cheachraen chean staerte be  reah bek  ning phendei staerte bek khe  t ch khtei  ning phnom teanglay staerte rlom  rleay .
19|91|daoy puokke ban chaotobrakean tha  mcheasa mha sabborsa  mean botr .
19|92|haey min sakdesam te  del tha mcheasa mha sabborsa  mean botr noh .
19|93|real anak del now leumekh cheachraen chean  ning phendei ku trauv  te tralb towkean mcheasa mha sabborsa knong lokkhan chea khnhom robsa trong .
19|94|chea karpit nasa  trong ban doengpi chamnuon puokke  ning ban reab  chamnuon puokke yeang chbasaleasa .
19|95|haey puokke teangoasa nung tralb towkean trong vinh now thngai  barlok rieng  khluon .
19|96|pitabrakd nasa  banda anak del mean chomnue  ning ban sang ampeula  mcheasa mha sabborsa nung phdal kdei anet sraleanh dl puokke .

19|97|dau che  neah  pitabrakd nasa  yeung ban samruol vea( kompir kuor an)  chea pheasaea robsa anak( mou ham meat)  daembi anak nung phdal damnoeng rikreay  dl banda anak del kaotakhlach a l laoh  ning dasatuen promean  dl krom del pouke chhlohbrakek knea tamory vea .

19|98|haey yeung ban bamphlanh asa cheachraen chomnean mk haey moun  puokke( mou sh ri ki n mea kkah)  tae anak( mou ham meat) kheunh anaknea mneak  knongchamnaom puokke  ryy lyy saamleng khsaoebakhsaiev pi puokke der ryyte
